textContent:
---its (supposed to be) one of those days---

January 8, 2024 is supposed to be one of those days where I feel like wearing all black. It's one of days where I'll do nothing all day and only reply in smiles and nods. But somehow you've managed to turn it around. 

Earlier this morning, I've told you how I've been feeling insecure and worried and scared. I'm afraid that maybe you won't like me. I'm afraid that maybe you'll stop talking to me the way you talk to me now. For years I've handled failure and rejection and successfully managed to twist it into a learning experience. But now, I even dread thinking of the thought of you not reciprocating what I feel for you.

To be honest though, insecurity and fear, it's mere existence, is not really a bad thing. Insecurity can lead to self-improvement, and the fear of losing you basically means that I value you. Diba ang ganda? Isn't the thought that I get to experience those things because of you wonderful? My insecurity and fear are proof of my feelings for you, Rei. I'll wear them proudly.

Achk. 

Kilig.

Ano ba yan. Dapat sappy and senti tong entry na to. But you really managed to turn it around.

---Rei Effect---

noun.  The capability of my very special person to shine a light to my darkest days (its cliche. deal with it.), and to make me want to be a better person so that I'll be the person she deserves.

---Insecurity and fear---

As I was writing this entry, I've finally found a solution for my insecurity and fear! It won't make them disappear, but it would at least help mitigate their negative effects. You see Rei, I was afraid and insecure that you won't reciprocate my feelings. And yes, as I've mentioned on the first part of this entry, my fears and insecurities are both justifiable and wonderful. 

But then naalala ko na masama nga pala ugali ko hahaha. I realized something. It's not like you not liking me back will invalidate what I'm already feeling. It's not like it will render the wonderful feelings I have for you worthless. It feels good liking you, Rei. It makes me feel bubbly and makes me smile at the most inconsequential things. I'm a selfish and greedy person Rei. I'm not liking you for you. I like you because it feels good and it makes me happy. (pero sympre gus2hin m nrin aq dba. syang nman. asjdasdassd).
title: January 8, 2024
textContentHtml:
---its (supposed to be) one of those days---


January 8, 2024 is supposed to be one of those days where I feel like wearing all black. It's one of days where I'll do nothing all day and only reply in smiles and nods. But somehow you've managed to turn it around. 


Earlier this morning, I've told you how I've been feeling insecure and worried and scared. I'm afraid that maybe you won't like me. I'm afraid that maybe you'll stop talking to me the way you talk to me now. For years I've handled failure and rejection and successfully managed to twist it into a learning experience. But now, I even dread thinking of the thought of you not reciprocating what I feel for you.


To be honest though, insecurity and fear, it's mere existence, is not really a bad thing. Insecurity can lead to self-improvement, and the fear of losing you basically means that I value you. Diba ang ganda? Isn't the thought that I get to experience those things because of you wonderful? My insecurity and fear are proof of my feelings for you, Rei. I'll wear them proudly.


Achk. 


Kilig.


Ano ba yan. Dapat sappy and senti tong entry na to. But you really managed to turn it around.


---Rei Effect---


noun.  The capability of my very special person to shine a light to my darkest days (its cliche. deal with it.), and to make me want to be a better person so that I'll be the person she deserves.


---Insecurity and fear---


As I was writing this entry, I've finally found a solution for my insecurity and fear! It won't make them disappear, but it would at least help mitigate their negative effects. You see Rei, I was afraid and insecure that you won't reciprocate my feelings. And yes, as I've mentioned on the first part of this entry, my fears and insecurities are both justifiable and wonderful. 


But then naalala ko na masama nga pala ugali ko hahaha. I realized something. It's not like you not liking me back will invalidate what I'm already feeling. It's not like it will render the wonderful feelings I have for you worthless. It feels good liking you, Rei. It makes me feel bubbly and makes me smile at the most inconsequential things. I'm a selfish and greedy person Rei. I'm not liking you for you. I like you because it feels good and it makes me happy. (pero sympre gus2hin m nrin aq dba. syang nman. asjdasdassd).
